body_html:
Hi @freedomtan , I'm trying to build with bazel command like mentioned below.

bazel build --cxxopt=--std=c++11 -c opt --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=armeabi-v7a tensorflow/contrib/lite/java:libtensorflowlite_jni.so

I have specified -llog with an option (--linkopt=-llog) to bazel command like shown below, but still am not able to see any prints in logcat.

bazel build --linkopt=-llog --cxxopt=--std=c++11 -c opt --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=armeabi-v7a tensorflow/contrib/lite/java:libtensorflowlite_jni.so

Can you please suggest some workarounds?

Thanks

Thanks
body:
Hi @freedomtan , I'm trying to build with bazel command like mentioned below.

bazel build --cxxopt=--std=c++11 -c opt --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=armeabi-v7a tensorflow/contrib/lite/java:libtensorflowlite_jni.so

I have specified -llog with an option (--linkopt=-llog) to bazel command like shown below, but still am not able to see any prints in logcat.

bazel build --linkopt=-llog --cxxopt=--std=c++11 -c opt --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=armeabi-v7a tensorflow/contrib/lite/java:libtensorflowlite_jni.so

Can you please suggest some workarounds?

Thanks
